div.i: This Proposal when signed by the customer and Jan Fence, Inc will constitute a binding contract.

ol.p:
1. Charges for Late Payment.
If we do not receive full payment within 10 days after it is due, you will be responsible for a late payment charge of 5% of the unpaid amount or $10.00, whichever is greater. You will be responsible for all costs involved should nonpayment require third party intervention. This includes but is not limited to court fees, lawyer fees and any other service needed to finalize the Contracts terms. Nonpayment will also void your warranty status with Jan Fence, Inc.

2. Change in Address.
You must notify us in writing within 30 days of any change in your address.

3. Official Fees, Taxes and Fines.
You must promptly pay all official fees and taxes, if applicable, related to this installation, including permit fees, inspection fees and personal property taxes. Some bills for official fees and taxes may be sent to you for payment. Other bills may be paid by us on your behalf, and we will charge you the amount paid. You must pay all fees incurred during the installation, even if they are assessed and billed after the installation has ended. We may charge you an estimated amount for the remaining fees at the end of the installation. You are responsible for any shortage in this estimate, and we will refund you any excess.

4. Installation.
We shall furnish and install a fence as agreed upon previously and any additional work as described herein at the address listed on the reverse. We agree to complete coverage, except in omitted areas. We shall be permitted to make all necessary alterations in its judgement required to accomplish the work to be performed. We will make every effort to avoid damage to lawn, shrubs, and property, but by reason of the nature of the work are not responsible for any damage caused during installation.

5. Completion Date.
We shall make a good faith effort to complete the installation on or about the date mentioned herein. If completion date is not met by us, we shall not be held responsible for any delay.

6. Boundaries.
You will provide an accurate survey or diagram of the property boundaries upon which we may rely. You will indemnify any claims arising from the location of the fence.

7. Permits.
You will obtain and be responsible for the cost of the necessary permits and variances.

8. Indemnification.
Unless Jan Fence’s own negligence, you shall defend, hold harmless Jan Fence, its employees, officers, directors, and affiliates from any cost, expense, or damage claimed by third parties for property damage and/or bodily injury, including death, which arises from or is related to the installation, use, maintenance, or operation of the fence system and/or any work performed by Jan Fence to the greatest extent permitted by law.

9. Limited Liability.
You shall in no manner hold Jan Fence, its employees, officers, directors, and affiliates liable for bodily injury or property damages resulting from and/or inflicted to underground pipes, wires, cables, invisible dog fences, pool lines or any other underground structure that is not clearly marked on a surveyor diagram of location to scale, of for the improper placement of the fence. Furthermore, we shall not be responsible for empty ground space due to rocky conditions, property grading or heavily sloped areas. You are responsible for all repairs of any damage outlined within this paragraph and for all property boundaries.

10. Notices.
All correspondence and notices will be sent to the billing address shown on the Contract unless you give us an alternate address in writing.

11. Choice of Law Severability.
You agree that the law of the State of New Jersey applies to this Contract. If certain provisions of this contract violate the law, those provisions will be void, and the rest of the Contract will be enforceable. The venue of any litigation under this agreement shall be in a court of competent jurisdiction in the State of New Jersey.

12. No Waiver by Us.
If we delay or refrain from exercising our rights under this Contract, we do not lose those rights. If we accept late or partial payments from you, we do not waive our rights to receive full and timely payments.

13. Modification or Amendment.
No amendment, change or modification of this Contract shall be valid unless in writing and signed by both parties hereto.

14. Miscellaneous.
All material is guaranteed to be as specified. All work to be completed in a workmanlike manner according to standard practices. Any alteration or deviation from the within specifications involving extra cost will be done only upon a written change order. The costs will become an extra charge over and above the estimate. All elements of this agreement are contingent upon strikes, accidents, or delays beyond our control. The estimate does not include material price increases or additional labor and materials which may be required should unforeseen problems arise after the work has commenced.

15. NJ Department of Consumer Affairs Consumer Service Center Hotline.
(973) 504-6200, Toll Free (NJ Only): 800-242-5846.

16. Insurance.
A copy of the certificate of commercial general liability insurance can be obtained upon request. The telephone of the insurance company issuing the certificate is (973) 256-7703

div.p: Jan Fence, Inc warrants only the original purchaser that all new fencing is free from defects in material and workmanship, under normal and proper usage. This warranty only applies to defects resulting from normal use and not from changes by alteration, abuse, fire, flood, unstable soil, underground water conditions, checking, warping, and “Acts of God”. Under this warranty, obligation is limited to replacement of the defective material this warranty gives you specific legal rights and may also have other rights which may vary from state to state.
